headers.subject: [tosdr:2679] [bad] jobvite.com can change terms without notifying you

html:
From http://recruiting.jobvite.com/terms-of-use.php :

YOU AGREE THAT JOBVITE, INC. AND ITS LICENSORS MAY MAKE CHANGES TO THE SERVICES OFFERED ON THIS SITE, AT ANY TIME WITHOUT NOTICE, AND YOU FURTHER AGREE THAT JOBVITE, INC. CAN REVISE THESE TERMS OF USE FOR THE SITE AND SERVICES AT ANY TIME WITHOUT NOTICE BY POSTING AN UPDATED TERMS OF USE ON THE SITE. YOU AGREE THAT YOUR CONTINUED USE OF THE SITE AND/OR THE SERVICES AFTER SUCH MODIFICATIONS HAVE BEEN POSTED CONSTITUTES YOUR ACCEPTANCE OF SUCH REVISED TERMS WHETHER OR NOT YOU HAVE REVIEWED SUCH CHANGES. FOR THIS REASON, YOU SHOULD CHECK THE TERMS OF USE POSTED ON THE SITE PERIODICALLY FOR UPDATES AND CHANGES.

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
---
